pages.text: 37|127|antatah, unhonne jhuthala diya use. to nishchay vahee (narak mein) upasthit honge.
37|128|kintu, allaah ke shudhd bhakt.
37|129|tatha shesh rakhee hamane usakee shubh charcha pichhalon mein.
37|130|salaam hai ilyaaseen[1] par.
37|131|vaastav mein, ham isee prakaar pratiphal pradaan karate hain, sadaachaariyon ko.
37|132|vastutah, vah hamaare eemaan vaale bhakton mein se tha.
37|133|tatha nishchay loot nabiyon mein se tha.
37|134|jab hamane mukt kiya use tatha usake sabaparijanon ko.
37|135|ek budhiya[1] ke siva, jo peechhe rah jaane vaalon mein thee.
37|136|phir hamane anyon ko tahas-nahas kar diya.
37|137|tatha tum[1] guzarate ho un (kee nirjeev bastiyon) par, praatah ke samay.
37|138|tatha raatri mein. to kya tum samajhate nahin ho
37|139|tatha nishchay yoonus nabiyon mein se tha.
37|140|jab vah bhaag[1] gaya bharee naav kee or.
37|141|phir naam nikaala gaya, to vah ho gaya phenke huon mein se.
37|142|to nigal liya use machhalee ne aur vah nindit tha.
37|143|to yadi na hota allaah kee pavitrata ka varnan karane vaalon mein.
37|144|to vah rah jaata usake udar mein us din tak, jab sab punah jeevit kiye[1] jaayenge.
37|145|to hamane phenk diya use khule maidaan mein aur vah rogee[1] tha.
37|146|aur uga diya us[1] par lataon ka ek vrksh.
37|147|tatha hamane use rasool banaakar bheja ek laakh, balki adhik kee or.
37|148|to ve eemaan laaye. phir hamane unhen sukh-suvidha pradaan kee ek samay[1] tak.
37|149|to (he nabee!) aap unase prashn karen ki kya aapake paalanahaar ke lie to putriyaan hon aur unake lie putr
37|150|athava kiya hamane paida kiya hai farishton ko naariyaan aur ve us samay upasthit[1] the
37|151|saavadhaan! vaastav mein, ve apane man se banaakar ye baat kah rahe hain.
37|152|ki allaah ne santaan banaee hai aur nishchay ye mithya bhaashee hain.
37|153|kya allaah ne praathamikta dee hai putriyon ko, putron par
